post:
[DeinServerHost](https://DeinServerHost.de "https://DeinServerHost.de") is a german dedicated / game / vps hosting provider founded in 2013. We aim to offer you a high quality service for an affordable price.

Currently we are having a special dedicated server deal only published on LET.

**AMD Ryzen LET**
Ryzen 3700X CPU (8 Cores 16 Threads)
32GB DDR4 RAM
1TB HDD
1Gbit/s uplink
30TB FairUse Traffic Flat
1x IPv4 (more for 1,20€/mo)
1x IPv6 /112

40€ (46,65USD)/mo 0€ Setup

https://deinserverhost.de/store/cart.php?a=add&pid=463

Upgrades: 

2TB HDD 2€/mo  (2,33$)
120GB SSD 2€/mo (2,33$)
250GB SSD 3€/mo  (3,50$)
500GB SSD 5€/mo  (5,83$)
1000GB SSD 10€/mo  (11,67$)

64GB RAM 8€/mo (9,33$)

We also have a Budget IPv6 KVM VPS, which we call **KVM NVMe Flex**

1 Intel Xeon / AMD Epyc vCore
1GB RAM
10GB SSD
1x IPv6 
250GB Bandwidth @ 100Mbit/s 

1€ (1,17$) /mo 
IPv4 available as addon for 1€/mo
https://deinserverhost.de/store/cart.php?a=add&pid=447

All our servers are currently hosted in Germany, Frankfurt am Main and come with Combahton (Fastpipe) DDoS Protection.
